Pretty weak this month. Anal only? No penetration? That's just not acceptable.

Alright, I actually think this is with a 7. A couple stories (Yam, the succubus ones, and Ookami Uo especially) suffer from being a bit too short imo. For the most part though, I think the selection of artists was good, but also that said artists actually delivered on their namesakes. I’m not a fan of Shota/Loli tbh, but chiguchi miri’s story was by no mans bad. Similar feeling toward Mamezou’s anal focus story; really not my thing, but I can’t really call it “bad”, just not my thing. Otherwise, Maeshima Ryou, Highlow, Rico, nekodanshaku, and a number of the smaller artists all delivered excellent works this month. I was particularly surprised by that story at the end by mdo-h, I’m not usually a fan of their work so I was pleasantly surprised by its quality and story. Anyway, it’s without a doubt consistently high quality than the last few volumes, so I feel a 7 is quite fitting. PS, Kinomoto Anzu’s story was exceptional, totally not biased from someone who loves blowjob scenes.
Starts kinda weak but it gets a little better at the end. A little better than the last couple issues at least. Still waiting for ponsuke.
